snippet: Julio Acevedo, who told friends he planned to surrender to the police, had not yet done so as of Tuesday evening.
abstract: Julio Acevedo, man suspected of fleeing scene of devastating car crash that killed young Brooklyn couple Raizy and Nathan Glauber and their prematurely born son is still being sought by police; he has told friends that he planned to turn himself it, but has not yet done so.
lead_paragraph: Julio Acevedo, who told friends he planned to surrender to the police, had not yet done so as of Tuesday evening.

headline.seo: Man Wanted in Brooklyn Hit-Run Crash Is Still at Large
headline.main: Police Wait After Pledge to Surrender in Fatal Crash
headline.print_headline: Police Wait After Pledge To Surrender In Fatal Crash
